name: THE GUN-TIST
description:
YOU PLAY A NOW EX-CULTIST, REALIZING THE NEXT ONE BEING SACRIFICED WOULD BE YOU. ESCAPE.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

WASD - Standard Controls (Up, Left, Down, Right)

Left Click (HOLD) - Shoot

Right Click (HOLD) - Reflect Enemy Bullets

Escape - Back to Menu (WARNING THIS IS INSTANT)

Finished 10 seconds before the deadline, and didn't have time to put in sound. So imagine the shooty shoot noises :(
